remarks: Lemma for orthomodular law in the Hilbert lattice.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-1999.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
omlsilem.1 $e |- G e. SH $.
omlsilem.2 $e |- H e. SH $.
omlsilem.3 $e |- G C_ H $.
omlsilem.4 $e |- ( H i^i ( _|_ ` G ) ) = 0H $.
omlsilem.5 $e |- A e. H $.
omlsilem.6 $e |- B e. G $.
omlsilem.7 $e |- C e. ( _|_ ` G ) $.
omlsilem $p |- ( A = ( B +h C ) -> A e. G ) $.
